ComicInfo.Title: Vlad to See You Again
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Witch Cult Saga concludes, and a surprise villain returns from Elvira's past! (At least... it's a surprise if you don't look at John Royle's variant cover...) The Mistress of the Dark can deliver you a climax like no other, and here it comes, in the twelfth and final issue of Elvira's ribald romp, brought to you with joy, laughter and terrible puns.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Tom Mandrake (a) & Sian Mandrake (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Craig Cermak (a) & Brittany Pezzillo (c) | 2 | C | Cover C | John Royle (a) & Mohan (c) | 3 | D/Sub | Subscription Cover | Photo | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Craig Cermak (a) & Brittany Pezzillo (c) | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | John Royle | 6 | G/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Tom Mandrake (a) & Sian Mandrake (c) | 7 | H/FOC | FOC Retailer Incentive Bonus Edition Variant Cover | Roberto Castro (a) & Salvatore Aiala (c) | 8 | I/FOC | 1:11 FOC Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Roberto Castro | 9 | J/FOC | 1:15 FOC Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Roberto Castro (a) & Salvatore Aiala (c) | 10 | K/FOC | 1:21 FOC Retailer Incentive "Black & White Virgin" Edition Variant Cover | Roberto Castro | 11 |
